availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Woodard German (Louisville, Kentucky agent and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, agent and soldier. Kentucky native. Agent in Louisville, Kentucky in 1865. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry as Second Lieutenant from August 18, 1863 to December 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Louisville, Kentucky, City Directory, 1865 Ancestry.com, U.S. City Directories 1822-1995, p. 316.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 436.
Find A Grave, "David Woodard German (Jul 1, 1838-Sep 16, 1908)," Memorial #126449552, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126449552 (accessed June 11, 2020).
